biotools.summary: Aging Atlas is a curated biomedical database comprising a range of aging-related multi-omics datasets (i.e. transcriptomics, single-cell transcriptomics, epigenomics, proteomics, and pharmacogenomics), as well as bioinformatics tools to query and visualize these datasets.

bioschemas.name: Aging Atlas
